name: printed wiring board mounting facility construction | printed wiring board mounting facility | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9854/documentation

This dataset represents one unit of production site for the mounting of printed wiring boards, comprising 6 SMT lines and 5 THT lines.It is based on a combined SMT and THT mounting plant as in more complex PWB constructions (like e.g. for computer motherboards) with an assumed output of 60'000 m2 or 192â€™000 kg per year over a time span of 25 years. . Main data based on own estimations, using rough information about Asian plants, infrastructure of the printed wiring board mounting plant datasets for the construction and dismantling of the different buildings as well as the technical equipment are used.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From unknown land use forseen for production site for printed wiring board mounting.

This dataset includes land use, buildings and facilities (machinery, cables, etc.) as well as the respective disposal activities of a plant for printed wiring board mounting. Emissions and wastes are not included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This module relates to the global situation.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Up-to-date SMT and THT mounting plant, based on information from literature and a plant visit in Switzerland

exchanges.description:
Mounting plant for the mounting equipment in the case of surface mount technology (SMT) and through-hole technology (THT).

flow.name: printed wiring board mounting facility
flow.category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

exchanges.description: Estimation, based on the description of several PC motherboard mounting facilities in China and own assumptions, 12 month used to construction and dismantling of the whole plant.

EcoSpold01Location=GLO
Estimation, based on the description of several PC motherboard mounting facilities in China, assuming a life-span of 10 years, 2.5 times are taken into account here.
